name: Union Support L Brackets
description:
Crafted using a combination of both man and machine.  These L brackets are designed based on 1930's steel truss construction.  1/8" x 1 1/2" steel, and available in multiple finishes.  10" x 10".  Ideally anchor to studs.

*allow up to 2-3 weeks time depending on quantity
*please contact for large quantities

name: Union Camp Carrier & Stand
description:
"Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice."
-Henry Ford

Our camp carrier and stand is the perfect accessory for both your city-cabin dwellers, and rustic campvibe set.  12oz natural canvas with Horween leather straps that will only get better with time.  Surrounded by a 3/4 steel frame, with a wood base this piece will stay with the family.

*Please allow up to 1-2 weeks lead time prior to shipping
*Shipping price is for the "carrier" only.  If you order the carrier & stand we will send a paypal invoice for +$20 for the shipping to be paid prior to shipment

name: Lapore Tripod Stool
description:
Designed by Tyler Lapore, the tripod stool is a great way to add pops of colour and contour to your dining room.  Powder coated in mint green, or stark white, the Lapore stool is sleek and minimal.  Raw, reclaimed fir 14" stool top.

*please allow up to 2 weeks lead time for quantities 
*contact for larger quantities

name: Vintage Army Canvas Dog Bed
description:
Each bed is hand cut from out-of-service US Military pup tents reclaimed from an Arizona desert depot.  Water repellant and ready for rough use, vintage waxed canvas is ideal for you pet to lay his weary head after a long day of adventure.  Exterior shell removable for washing.  Each tent bears unique scars from wear-and-tear in the field.  Available in two standard sizes.  Please inquire for custom sizing. 4' Poly-wrap interior.


*Please allow 4-6 business days lead time prior to shipping

name: Go West T-Shirt
description: Designed exclusively for us,by our friend Shane Swift (http://blackmagnoliaclub.com) this shirt evokes all the sentiment and nostalgia we stand for.  Hand drawn and silkscreened on premium cotton.

name: Trouble-Light Cage
description:
Light bulb cages protect your bulbs from breaking.  More importantly, they look good.  

Add a depresion-era industrial look to any room, fixture or pendant with these aged steel cages. They fit onto any medium base(standard) socket, porcelain, brass or steel.  They fit over standard or edison-style bulbs and allow easy bulb changing by opening at the bottom.


Single cage per order.  Does not include bulb or fixture.  We have many in stock.

name: Shop Apron (Vintage Army Canvas)
description:
Talk is cheap, clothes aren't. Pounding, sawing, painting, cutting, chipping, spraying and hammering take a toll on our attire, and those who work with their hands know this well.  Protect your clothes and look good.

These Shop Aprons are made from salvaged military service tents and feature hand cut leather straps, vintage brass hardware, chest pockets, inside phone pocket, and leather reinforced hand-hammered brass rivets.   Each strap is fastened with brass snaps for easy removal for washing.

name: Shop Apron (Waxed Duck Canvas)
description:
Talk is cheap, clothes aren't. Pounding, sawing, painting, cutting, chipping, spraying and hammering take a toll on our attire, and those who work with their hands know this well.  Protect your clothes and look good.

Each Canvas aprons is made from heavy-weight cotton duck canvas that we hand wax one at a time and feature hand cut leather straps, vintage brass hardware, chest pockets, inside phone pocket, and leather reinforced hand-hammered brass rivets.  Brass snaps allow the leather straps to be removed when washed.

name: Shop Apron (Blue Denim)
description:
Talk is cheap, clothes aren't. Pounding, sawing, painting, cutting, chipping, spraying and hammering take a toll on our attire, and those who work with their hands know this well.  Protect your clothes and look good.

These Shop Aprons are made from rigid denim and feature hand cut leather straps, vintage brass hardware, chest pockets, inside phone pocket, and leather reinforced hand-hammered brass rivets.  Brass snaps make the straps easily removable to allow the aprons to be washed when required.

name: Shop Apron (Black Canvas)
description:
Talk is cheap, clothes aren't. Pounding, sawing, painting, cutting, chipping, spraying and hammering take a toll on our attire, and those who work with their hands know this well.  Protect your clothes and look good.

These Shop Aprons are made from 12oz black canvas and feature hand cut leather straps, vintage brass hardware, chest pockets, inside phone pocket, and leather reinforced hand-hammered brass rivets.  Brass snaps make the straps easily removable to allow the aprons to be washed when required.

name: Union Wood Company Coat Hook
description:
Designed to replicate antiquated date nails, which became popular in the late 1800's for use in setting railroad ties.  Date nails, marked on the "head" with their production year,  were spiked into the rail ties as they were laid as a way to keep track of when wooden ties needed to be replaced.
Our solid bronze coat hook nails are as sturdy as they look and can be driven into backing surface or coat rack to act as the perfect dependable place to hang your most used goods.

3 1/2" long, 1/4" shank

name: Union Wood Serving/Cheese Boards
description:
Wood.  It never fades, and never falters.

These aged serving/cheese trays are made from the rafters of a local brick and mortar that was once used as a police horse stable/livery.  Dressed up with distressed steel handles on the top or sides, rubber feet, and of course the Union Wood Company tarnished metal plaque underneath.  Clean and solid, they'll age anything you want to serve on them, wine or cheese.

Wood features nail holes, cracks, checks and knots.  Each board has unique features and is roughly 12"L x 12"W x 2"H

name: Union Wood Company Mirror
description:
Hand-crafted out of the ceiling we pulled out of Vancouver's historic Maynards building, these mirrors are designed to be both handsome and helpful. Placing a mirror in any room aids to open up any small space.  These mirrors feature aged timber washers and salvaged raw  5" Douglas Fir.  Stocked in 2 appropriate sizes, these mirrors can also be made to any size.  All come equipped with a hanging cable which is easy to hang and able to withstand the mirrors weight.

*Shipping prices listed are for the Small Mirror.  Please contact prior to ordering Large Mirror, crating charges will apply.

name: Union Butcher Block Oil
description:
A proprietary blend of oils, beeswax and scent make this perfect for finishing all wood surfaces.  Non-toxic and 100% FoodSafe for any wood kitchen equipment.

Apply 1-3 thin coats wiping away excess oil after each application.  Dries clear and flat.  Also works on leather.  Apply evenly to your boots, belts and saddles!


8fl oz
Covers approx. 50sqft
Mixed and Manufactured in Vancouver, BC.

name: Reclaimed Fir Ipad Holder
description: Reclaimed fir ipad holder

name: Poplar Ipad Holder
description: Poplar ipad holder.

name: Walnut Ipad Holder
description: Solid walnut ipad holder.

name: Reclaimed Wood Serving Boards
description: Reclaimed wood serving boards. A mix of fir, oak and walnut wood. Features a leather strap and rubber feet on the bottom. *Please specify which type of wood you would prefer.

name: Oyster Cart
description: This cart has such a beautiful patina to it and would look great in your home or for use in a store front. Perfect for displaying or to use as a workstation. Measurements

name: Metal Shop Desk
description: The desk has tones of character and would look great in an office, store front or your workshop. Measures 60"L x 34"W x 34"H.

name: Industrial Folding Bench
description: This folding bench by "BT Tub" was patented in 1923 and still holds up to this day. Measurements are 42"L x 16"W x 21.5"H.

name: Butcher Block Table
description: Beautiful butcher block table. Measuring 30.5"W x 48"L x 34.75"H.

name: Buffalo Skull
description: Buffalo Skull.

name: Union Wood Company Raw Industrial Stool
description:
Based on stools that were saved from an ancient machine shop,  these bare-bones welded steel frame stools are built for both form and function.  Subtle and unassuming, these chairs add a touch of industrial aesthetic to any space and would look great beside any modern kitchen island.  Raw materials mixed with minimal design. Aged angle iron and reclaimed wood seats. 28"H

*contact for quantity and custom sizing.

name: Union Wood Company Lab Stool
description:
Our stools, modelled after a antique lab stool we picked up on our last salvage trip to Midwest America maintain clean, modern lines while allowing the materials speak to speak for themselves. Nostalgic of ages and spaces that longer exist,  our stools are well balanced and comfortable.  
Aged, welded steel frames and maple adjustable-height seats
Available in both table/desk height(19-23") and counter height (22-27")

name: Grey Industrial Parts Cabinet
description:
This is probably the best example of an early american parts cabinet we have seen in ages. 12 nice, usable drawer size with classic card pull hardware.  This piece (actually 2 units stacked on top of each other) has an amazing blue-grey tone, and the perfect amount of patina.  Well worn handles over years of use in an auto mechanics shop. You have to love the numbers too.  Cleaned and ready to go.

32"w x 18"d x 12"h

name: Vintage Anatomy Chart 1918 (Skeleton)
description:
Sourced as a set from a northwest classroom, this Human Skeleton pull-down chart is in amazing condition.  Completely free from rips, tears and fades, this item is by no means fresh out of the package.  This chart has been used over and over, time after time, but has been cared for.  A beautiful print with beautiful colours and amazing detail.  This is the perfect example of war era imagery.  The paper holds a patina only time can administer.  Printed in Chicago by A.J Nystrom & Co. Publishers and original created by American Froshe Wall Charts 1918.

Measures 72" x 42"

name: Victory Cups
description:
We love Victory Cups.  A great reminder of accomplishments and milestones marked with engravings in precious metals.  Large and small, each has its own character and story to go along with it.  They make great display in home or commercial settings.  These could be engraved and would make a great gift.  This listing is for ONE of the Victory Cups in the photo, please choose.  Each is unique, and is priced accordingly. Please inquire for more photos.
(Numbered 1-6 L-R)

1) 5 1/2" tall Silver & Wood Base 
"BC Telephone Co. Mixed Bowling League Season 1949-50 won by Circuits King Cavalsky"

2) 6" tall Copper
"1944 Wash State Championship Mens Juvenile Second"

3) 10 1/2" Copper w/plastic base

4) 6" tall Silver w/wood base

5) 8" tall Copper w/porcelain base

6) 6" tall Silver w/plastic base
"Glenbury Dairy Team 1949-50, Stuart Robinson"
